context: Hi! What kind of movies are you looking for today?
I want to watch some classics like The Birds (1963). Or maybe something like The Wizard of Oz (1939).
Have you seen both of those movies?
oh yes I have seen both of them multiple times.
Not as old but Airplane! (1980) I would consider a semi classic.
I have not seen Airplane! (1980) or if I have I do not remember it all. I will have to check that out.
Oh there is another old one that I always loved it has a little bit of everything it is called Little Shop of Horrors (1986).
resp: Along the same lines as Airplane is Dr. Strangelove (1964) which is a lesser known movie I was introduced to in a film class
